name: ReBound (itch) (Kyanto)
description:
Bounce towards the end of each level, avoid dangers and escape the lab!

Press "m" to mute the sound effects 

(recommended by the creator)

All comments are greatly appreciated to help me improve! :)

__________________________________________________________________

You are Bouncy, a peaceful fruit living in its tree.

 One day, you fell off and realized you bounce! 

(Who could have see that coming with such a name?)

Exploring the world, you enter a strange laboratory but the door shuts behind you!

You'll now have to avoid the dangers and find an exit.

Maybe you'll stumble upon something useful...
